Such evolutionary adaptations are simply par for the course in this arid biome.
Analysis of this variant will offer us greater insight into life in the desert!
A strange amalgamation of species, the chimera's addition to the animal kingdom coincides with the advent of mako.
This timing is likely no coincidence, as mako energy's adverse effects on creatures is well-documented.
Fossils that have been excavated rather recently, however, appear to be those of an ancient ancestor to the modern chimera.
Scientists have since postulated that the fiend actually has prehistoric origins.
Provenance aside, the beast is a proven threat to any living near its ever-expanding territory.
Please take care while squaring off against this mysterious foe!
This is it, Cloud: we've arrived at the great malboro's domain.
As I'm sure you've surmised from the aroma... Olfactory risk level: high.
Malboros native to the Gongaga region have been known to grow exceptionally large thanks to their ravenous appetite for woodland fauna.
This specimen, however, has undergone a unique evolution due to mako exposure.
It lures in carrion-feeders with a noxious odor, then uses toxins to weaken its prey. If allowed to thrive, the great malboro could destroy the entire ecosystem.
Facial coverings aren't required for this mission, but they are strongly recommended to reduce fume inhalation.
During mating season, the males undergo a chromatic change to attract females.
Visual analysis suggests love is in the air!
In order to draw its intended mate's attention, the amphidex will let air resonate through its vocal sac, resulting in a romantic serenade.
The melodic nature of its mating call is so intoxicating that other species have been known to fall under the amphidex's spell and pursue an unrequited love.
If you learned how to woo others like the amphidex, you could defeat any enemy without a fight!
It's not uncommon for the frightflower's germination period to last several decades.
Once it sprouts, however, the plant grows at an astonishing rate, fully maturing in a fraction of the time.
Adult frightflowers sink their fangs into unsuspecting animals that draw too close, draining their blood before supping on their flesh.
A carnivorous plant is frightening in itself, but the worst part is─
...I'm sorry, but the details are far too gruesome for me to share!
Please exterminate this pest before you learn the truth firsthand!
Generally speaking, grandhorns are peaceful creatures, which use their claws not for combat, but for unearthing insects to eat.
During mating season, they pair off to build nests and raise their young.
Those unable to find partners eventually take up the role of protector, guarding the nests of others, and keeping the newborns from harm.
Their crimson coloration is a warning to all would-be trespassers: "keep out."
The social structure of grandhorn communities is definitely worthy of further investigation!
The reactor disaster had a profound influence on the local ecosystem─including this particular breed.
Prolonged exposure to mako has reduced their impulse control.
Unlike most grandhorns, this variant lacks a sense of community, invading and upending territory belonging to others.
The long-term effects of mako poisoning on both flora and fauna are still not fully understood─but the world needs to know.
I hope you'll assist me in the investigation!
Farmers have long employed the maloceros as a source of agricultural labor.
Sadly, the beasts' numbers have dwindled over time, and in the chaos following the Gongaga reactor accident, the few remaining maloceros escaped and went completely feral.
Although these herbivores tend to have a rather calm disposition, some have been spotted traveling in herds and attacking other animals.
This change is likely due to mako exposure...
and I suspect it's only one of many abnormal developments.
Please exercise caution during your investigation.
Known best for its distinct fangs, the gagighandi is believed to have migrated to these lands from a faraway continent.
There it was revered as a sacred creature, and featured in the family crests of royalty.
While it's unclear how and why the gagighandi became established in Gongaga, some suspect it was drawn to the region's mako deposits.
Recent reports suggest the creatures have begun to expand their territory.
Their presence has undoubtedly altered the Gongaga ecosystem...
and I hope you will assist me in my quest to find out how!
Careful, Cloud! You have just entered jabberwock territory.
Unfortunately, we know very little about this enigmatic fiend at present.
I suggest you expect the unexpected!
Records that make mention of this dragon date back to antiquity.
Some state that this beast could survive for centuries without eating, or split the earth with a single stomp─but I find these claims specious.
That said, recent discoveries have confirmed that it can hibernate for extended periods by petrifying itself and delving deep into the scarlet soil.
The jabberwock is, in fact, active for such a short time that it's hardly ever seen.
Please, help us shed some light on this legendary dragon─for science!
As their name suggests, these sahagins are closely related to those found living in the sewers of Midgar.
Though they have instead adapted to the desert, they possess the same intelligence and social behaviors, and have been observed hunting in groups with their trademark tridents.
Their protective carapaces are so tough that the warriors of Cosmo Canyon once fashioned them into shields.
I would imagine those fiendish spikes offered them a measure of offense as well.
Remember: the sahagins have home-field advantage, so take care not to fall prey to their tactics. Best of luck!
The shimmering golden plumage of this variant was once so coveted that they were hunted to the brink of extinction─not that black market dealers cared.
Given this tragic, bloody history, one can hardly fault these skeeskees for their highly aggressive behavior when one of their own is taken from them.
Loath though I am to subject them to further trauma, I'm afraid this is the only way that we might learn more about them.
Please try to be as gentle as you can!
Griffons are a union of bird and beast that soar through the skies on mighty wings, and take down prey with sharp claws.
These creatures have existed for eons and appeared in countless legends, yet have never undergone scientific study. Or perhaps those who tried fell prey to the beast's hallucinogens.
Sightings of this variant are even rarer still, making this a golden opportunity!
Remember, though, to keep an eye on those tail feathers as you proceed with your investigation!
Lacking both visual and auditory senses, the capparwire tracks prey through vibrations in the ground, unleashing a relentless stream of precise attacks with its whip-like vines.
Because capparwire tendrils are both supple and sturdy, humans have used them as a material for handicrafts throughout history.
The vines of this particular variant are resistant to fire. A house wrapped in them could burn to the ground, and the tendrils would remain.
There's no telling what untapped potential these plant fiends possess. We're counting on you to help us find out!
Basilisks can change the color of their skin to blend into the environment and hunt prey undetected.
Shinra is studying this fiend in the hopes of replicating its camouflage capabilities.
This variant, however, doesn't simply alter its coloration. It manipulates the properties of its skin in accordance with the temperature, humidity, and lighting of its surroundings.
Be sure to rely on all your senses if you don't want to lose track of it!
Strictly speaking, golems are not "living creatures."
They're soulless clay dolls, animated only by the lifestream.
It is thought that the Ancients created them long ago with their unique technology.
Though it remains unclear why they would have left their constructs in a place like this. We may never know the answer.
After the disappearance of their masters, the golems fell into disrepair. Corrupted by impurities flowing through the lifestream, they grew violent.
Please put an end to their destructive rampage─for the sake of the locals, if nothing else.
Be warned, Cloud. You have entered the king zu's domain.

This is a highly dangerous fiend.
Proceed with extreme caution.
King zu detected in the vicinity.
It's little wonder this majestic zu earned such a lofty title.
Zus adhere to a "strict pecking order," in which the largest male is recognized as the one and only king.
This preeminent specimen eventually leaves the flock to live in complete solitude.
The reason for this behavior is unclear, though some theorize that they do so to create an environment in which a new king can one day emerge.
Perhaps your efforts here will help us get to the bottom of this and many other mysteries.
The wolves of this region maintain a strict hierarchy. The pack leader is said to be imbued with an azure flame, which gives its fur a distinct hue.
As the leader, this wolf will often distract prey, allowing for its pack mates to sneak up and catch their quarry by surprise.
They are highly intelligent, to say the least. In fact, there are countless stories of these wolves turning the tables on would-be poachers.
We may never get a better chance to study the ways of this clever creature.
So go get that data! But watch out for its friends.
Note the distinct shape of its upper jaw.
That sharp, many-toothed appendage allows it to skewer prey. The kyuvildun then uses its forelegs to bring the impaled meal to its mouth.
These voracious omnivores will eat anything they find, including plants, animals, and even corpses of fiends.
Depending on what they've devoured recently, their appearance and physical capabilities may vary.
While individuals do not pose much of a threat, they can be extremely dangerous in large groups.
Culling these fiends will help keep the nearby village and farmsteads safe from their appetites.
It is thought that the ominous coloring of this variant is meant to intimidate its enemies.
This corresponds with its aggressive nature: once it finds prey, it attacks in a frenzy.
As an aside, valrons were sighted in this area only after the mako reactor was constructed.
Because of its humanoid form, there were rumors at the time that these creatures were actually humans who had undergone a horrific transformation due to mako exposure.
Setting aside the veracity of these claims, one thing is certain: the advent of the reactor coincided with the valrons' appearance.
This could be a good opportunity to delve into the mysteries of their origins.
As the disgorgon evolved, it grew exponentially in size, until it could no longer fly. At the same time, however, it began to produce a deadly toxin.
This toxin is found in its cheeks and jaw, and can be stored in large quantities.
It's created from the insects that form a staple of the disgorgon's diet.
The toxin's properties vary from species to species, and are dictated by the type of insects consumed.
This variant, for instance, is capable of paralyzing its prey, so caution is advised.
Nevertheless, we mustn't let such dangers deter us!
Who's up for some climbin'? Anyone?
So you know, that tower ain't gonna activate itself.
Let's get that tower up and runnin', huh?
We gonna put that tower to use or what?
Damn... Those things sure are big.
Anybody wanna check out that tower?
I'm up for climbing that tower if you guys are.
I know I'd like to get some more data on this region...
That tower looks pretty old... Hope it still works.
Hey. Shall we pay that tower a visit?
Anyone else feel like learning a little more about the planet?
Let's turn on that tower and see what's out there!
Let us awaken that sleeping giant.
Anybody wanna race to that tower?
Should we go activate that thing or what?
Ah, nothing beats the thrill of discovery!
I gotcha in my sights now, tower!
Anyone else think it'd be fun to climb one of those things?
Ah! Patience, lonely tower. We'll be with you soon!
Ooh, hand over Chadley's whatchamacallit. I've got a date with that tower!
If that's not a tower, I don't know what is.
Just to let you know, there's a tower nearby!
Anyone feel like bootin' up that tower?
Hey, check it out. Got some chocobo tracks.
Looks like chocobos came through here.
Wanna go make some new chocobo friends?
Wonder if we'll see some chocobos.
We're gonna follow these tracks, right?
Oh, I can't wait to play with a chocobo!
These tracks look pretty chocobo-y, don'tcha think?
We're comin' for you, my beautiful birdie!
Kweh, kweh! Well? Sound just like 'em, don't I?
Somethin' tells me we're in chocobo territory!
Careful now. Wouldnae wanna scare the birds!
Oh wow, that mushroom has a door!
Look, it's a little mushroom house!
Whoa, get a load of that thing!
And I thought Gongaga mushrooms were impressive!
Who wants to play with the moogles?
D'you think the moogles are in?
Wanna hang out with the moogles?
Anyone else wanna see what the moogles're up to, kupo?
Wanna drop in on the moogles?
I wonder what it'd be like to live inside a mushroom.
Shall we say hello to the moogles?
Anyone care to meet with a moogle?
Can we play with the moogles? Please?
We gotta go party with the moogles!
Is that a moogle emporium I see, kupo?
Wee visit to the moogle house, maybe?
Those moogles... Honestly, what are they like?
Fiends, huh? Been itchin' for a fight.
Think we've got fiends on our hands.
Better not let your guard down.
Ugh... I don't like the look of this.
Anyone else smell monsters? 'Cause I do.
Uh-oh... It seems we've crossed into fiend territory. Look alive, people!
Oh, monsters! Come out, come out, wherever you aaare!
Oho! Is it time to kick some monster butt?
It's lucky I sharpened my claws!
My sensors indicate the presence of a unique life-form.
Dangerous fiends may be in the vicinity. Exercise caution.
It just me, or is something glowin'?
Hey, you see that? I think it's the lifestream!
Look! The lifestream! Isn't it incredible?
Oh wow, it smells just like home!
That's the biggest materia I've ever seen!
And what have we here? A wee spring?
Should we check out that spring?
Pulse of the planet's real strong here, isn't it?
When the lifestream calls, you gotta answer!
Couldn't hurt to check out the spring.
Let's scan the spring and get our bearings.
How about a chat with the planet?
Can't help but find these places comforting.
Let us partake of the planet's wisdom.
Shall we commune with the planet?
Anyone else wanna stop and rest by the spring?
We are gonna check out that spring, right?
Ooh, lifestream's really bubblin' up here!
If you direct your attention this way, you'll see the lifestream welling up from deep underground.
A spring, eh? Shall we have a wee shufty?
There's a chip buried around here.
Let's get searchin' for that chip.

Alright, transmuter chip...
Come out, come out, wherever you are!
Wonder if we'll find a new formula here.
Time to call in a feathery favor.
Kweh-dy or not, chip, here we come!
Alright! Time to find that transmuter chip.
Now where could that chip be hiding?
Shall we search here for that chip?
A chip may be buried nearby.
Time to sniff out that transmuter chip!
Gotta be a chip around here somewhere.
Everybody ready? Time to find ourselves a new transmuter chip.
I was just thinking about how I wanted to find a new formula.
Kweh, kweh! Where in the kweh is that transmuter chip?
Right then! Let's see if we can't find that chip!
Be a good birdie and sniff out that chip for us, would you?
Unless you're dyin' to do the legwork, let a bird find the chip.
It might be easier to find that chip if we used a chocobo.
Maybe we could get a chocobo to help us hunt down that chip.
Perhaps a feathered friend could assist us in the search.
I oughta have a chocobo teach me how to hunt for these chips.
Now, my feathery steed, go forth and find me the transmuter chip I seek!
I'll bet a chocobo could track down that chip in no time!
We have to find the others first.
What's that all about? Do you know, Cid?
Don't think we can get any closer.

Whoa, no way...
Hey, Cloud, lemme see that!
This reeks of sea salt─and not the fresh kind, either. This thing smells ancient.
Yeah. Gramps told me about it once.
Long ago, when most folks spent their lives at sea, a war broke out between some pirates.
I mean, how do you think they came up with Pirate's Rampage? It's based on a true story!
Gather round, and hearken to my tale.
Before steel birds soared through the skies and tracks wove across the land, wooden ships were the primary means of travel.
One such ship was crewed not by men, but monsters─hellions of the high seas.
From the fires of war these pirates emerged victorious, leaving crimson waters in their wake.
With the world's oceans now his sole dominion, their captain was declared the pirate king.
Ere his passing, he took his most prized possession, quartered it, and sealed those pieces away.
Along with his four finest mates─to forever stand guard.
Whatever he hid, this map should point us to the locations in which its fragments rest.
The spell he used to seal them away seems to have broken as well.
Though the pirate king's treasure is now ours to seek, four ferocious fiends yet stand in our way.
Doubtless, they'll put up quite a fight...
And I for one can't wait!
Well then. We've collected all the lost fragments.
Time to reassemble the pirate king's treasure.

Where are you going?
We've got a treasure to transmute!
Ye've trounced me best mates, which means ye're more than worthy of takin' me treasured compass.
Thar be no roads on the high seas. Ye're at the mercy of the wind and waves, bound to their whim.
The ocean's a capricious lass. Fickle and cruel, she'll do her best to drag you into the depths.
But man or monster, it's yer mateys that'll see ye through. I treated mine with respect, and they stuck with me till the end.
Of course, there was no shortage of scurvy dogs who had it out for us.
But instead of hangin' the jib, we laughed in their faces.
Aye, that's the way: trust in yer hearties and yerself─and when all else fails, let that compass be yer guide.
May yer spoils be plenty, and the wind always at yer back.
Oh man, who knows where that compass'll take us! Maybe it'll lead us to some crazy treasure!
I can't wait to find out!
I mean, nothing could compare to the greatest treasure of all: the planet!
Okay, crew! Let's weigh anchor and hoist the mizzen! The lifestream's calling and it's high time we set sail!
Use a cushion to rest here?
You cannot rest here without a cushion.
Intel has been relayed to Chadley.
The emporium has expanded its selection.
You cannot travel any further on chocoback.
<object=0>'s equipment cannot be changed at present.
<object=0>'s materia cannot be changed at present.

Strike an enemy with twin orbs of concentrated energy. Deals increased damage with Umbral Aura active.
Throws one or more giant bombs that create large explosions.
Cause a massive shockwave. Significantly increases stagger.
Spew a concentrated beam of water in a wide arc. Significantly increases stagger.
Harness and release a massive concentration of water to damage nearby enemies.
Charge at an enemy with a heavy snort.
Leap into the air and send out a shockwave upon landing.
Deal ice damage to nearby enemies. Significantly increases stagger.
Conjure a great glacier and bring it down upon an enemy's head. Significantly increases stagger.
Call forth rocks to trap the enemy.
Obliterate an enemy trapped in a granite shell.

The prize awarded to the champion of the onboard Queen's Blood tournament.
A key to the gate that leads to the bartender's abandoned vegetable patch.
Healthy and delicious greens beloved by chocobos.
A pass for members of the Corel region's rental stables. Those who join also receive chocobo gear as a sign-on bonus.
A whistle used to summon one's faithful bird with a single tweet.

A couple's ticket that allows its owners to participate in the following events:

Run Wild
Cactuar Caper
Wheelie Rendezvous
Royal Coast Concert

Includes a bonus ticket for one pet.

A ticket that allows its owner to participate in the following Costa del Amor events:

Pirate's Rampage
Card Carnival

A stylish ensemble for those who want to strut their stuff on the beach.
*Weapons will not be displayed while wearing this outfit.
A casual ensemble for those who want to go with the flow like a bird in their element.
A bold ensemble for those who want to live it up in paradise.
A breezy ensemble for those who want to bask in the tropical sun.

An adventurous ensemble for those who want to frolic in the shimmering sea.
*Weapons will not be displayed while wearing this outfit.
A simple ensemble for those who want to cut loose and ride the biggest waves.
A prize won during Costa del Amor that can be exchanged for beachwear.
A prize won during Costa del Amor that can be exchanged for beachwear.
A prize won during Costa del Amor that can be exchanged for beachwear.
One half of a couple's ticket that grants entry to the Gold Saucer's production of Loveless and the Skywheel.
A unique ticket that grants unlimited access to the Gold Saucer at no extra charge.
A device capable of transforming raw materials into practical items. Collect transmuter chips to learn new formulae.
An iron claw attached to the end of a long, sturdy rope.
The guise of a fool who guided a hero toward his destiny.
The guise of the Dragon King's fearsome attendant.
Fresh produce guaranteed to be a hit with any chocobo.

Hints intended to point avid truth-seekers in the right direction, as written by the aspiring swindlers.

1. Tried the booze at Bail Jumper?
2. Dare you to buy something from the weapon shop, Dead Silent.
3. Some book's selling gangbusters at the local Maghnata...
4. The graffiti at Gus's place is damn near art!
5. See the nasty fiends they got in the Beast Battleground?
A key to the underground storeroom Bugenhagen maintains.
An absolutely fabulous ensemble guaranteed to transform even the most humble ninja into the belle of the ball.
A multi-functional device for use in collecting world intel and facilitating long-range communication.
A medal with a moogle on it. These medals can be exchanged at moogle emporiums for rare and exotic items.
Information about this treasure is currently unavailable.

Nice hustle on the track, Cloud! With skills like that, you've definitely got what it takes to make it in the racing world. Next stop: the Gold Cup!
─Billy
Complete Hustle de Chocobo at Bill's ranch in the grasslands.

My mom's gliding course is no joke, but you passed it with flying colors. I'm impressed, I have to say. Just so you know, though, I'll be back in the saddle soon, and once I am, you can kiss that record of yours goodbye.
─Shani
Complete Glide de Chocobo in the Cosmo Canyon region.

Now that was some slick jumping, you guys! But it's like we frogsters always say: Ribbit ribbit? Ribbit...ribbit ribbit─ribbit, y'know?
─Finn
Complete Jumpfrog: Whirligig Whack in Under Junon.

Ribbit! Ribbit ribbit, ribbit? Ribbiiit! Ribbit ribbit, ribbit ribbit ribbit. Croak? Naaah, I'm just kidding! Hop on by whenever, alright? You guys are cool in our books.
─Finn
Complete Jumpfrog: Ribbiting Rollers in Under Junon.

Thanks for the amazing show! It was a real treat watching you and Mr. Dolphin zoom through the water like that! My grip isn't that great, so he always makes sure to go real slow whenever I swim with him. Bet it was a nice change of pace for him to go that fast!
─Priscilla
Complete the dolphin show in Under Junon.

Well done, sir! All of the cavalry congratulates you on your impressive victories. Without your tactical acumen and sagacity, we would never have triumphed over those rogues. We salute you, sir!
─The Condor Cavalry
Complete Fort Condor on Hard mode in the Junon region.

Congratulations. Your performance here was nothing short of immaculate─befitting of such a momentous occasion. Today marks a new era for Shinra, and your patriotism will be the cornerstone upon which we build our better tomorrow.
─President Rufus Shinra
Receive the president's commendation from Rufus Shinra in the inauguration parade.

Your captain's leadership educed from within your drill team a level of camaraderie and showmanship not often seen. This impressive display won over not only the crowd, but also our viewers at home. It makes me proud to know that troopers of your quality serve our company.
─Heidegger, Director of Public Security
Earn the award for outstanding performance in Rufus Shinra's inauguration parade in Junon.

Congratulations, Cloud. It was an inspiration to watch you rise through the ranks in your quest to be crowned the champion of our Queen's Blood tournament. On behalf of the entire Shinra-8 crew, we look forward to having you with us again for another rousing round of cards.
─Titov, Captain of the Shinra-8

Nothing can escape your eagle eyes, no sir! The look that came over you as you stared down the barrel of the gun...why, I bet you would have made the perfect first mate to the pirate king!
─Pirate's Rampage Staff Member
Complete the Brigantine stage of Pirate's Rampage in Costa del Sol.

Avast, ye've sunk the dread Ghost Ship with that fearsome sharpshooting of yers! Now the high seas are safe to sail once more thanks to you, me hearties!
─Pirate's Rampage Staff Member
Complete the Ghost Ship stage of Pirate's Rampage in Costa del Sol.

Well done solving those tricksy challenges of ours! I hope they didn't prove too difficult, though, as more await you─and much harder ones, at that! Drop by whenever you feel ready to put your QB skills to the test.
─Card Carnival Staff Member
Complete the easy rank card puzzles at Card Carnival in Costa del Sol.

Congratulations on conquering our most confounding challenges! As if Costa del Sol weren't hot enough, those impassioned plays of yours have lit a fire under all of our local QB aficionados!
─Card Carnival Staff Member
Complete the advanced rank card puzzles at Card Carnival in Costa del Sol.

Felicitations! Valiantly hast thou fought to attain the cards of legend. Never didst thy courage falter in thy noble quest. Indeed, thou art a hero true. Were the Shadowblood Queen herself hither to attend such a sight, surely she would commend thine efforts ardently. In her place, I hereby title thee with all respect.
─Card Carnival Shopkeep
Complete the collection challenges at Card Carnival in Costa del Sol.

You're now a serious QB force to be reckoned with! The skills you learned here are gonna make short work of any player who goes up against you! Almost feel sorry for them...
─Card Carnival Staff Member
Complete the skill drills at Card Carnival in Costa del Sol.

Awww, who's a good boy? Who's a good boooy? It's you! Yes, it is! You did so good today, yes you diiid! Extra pets for you today, you cutie!
─Run Wild Staff Member
Complete the free-for-all at Run Wild in Costa del Sol.

Awww, who's a fast boy? Who's a fast boooy? It's you! Yes, it is! You were so amazing out there, hitting all those balls into those goals, yes you were! Yes, you were! How's about some tropical meat for the good boy?
─Run Wild Staff Member
Complete the time trial at Run Wild in Costa del Sol.

You have a body of such muscled beauty that, were you to stand still long enough, one would think you were a master sculptor's magnum opus. You, my dear, are a true athlete. I bow before your adamantine abs.
─Jules
Complete the crunch-off at the training gym in the Corel region.

To commemorate your superior skills on the digitized open road, we offer you this. Congratulations. And, if I may say, judging by those skills, Mr. Strife, I would venture you've done that a few times before, perhaps?
─Wonderment Square Staff Member
Complete the standard course in G-Bike at the Gold Saucer.

You cut quite the handsome figure speeding through the dark of night astride your black steed. Keep putting pedal to the metal, young man! I can tell you're going places.
─Dio
Complete the expert course in G-Bike at the Gold Saucer.

Those polygonal punchers didn't stand a chance against your fists of fury! It's our sincere honor to provide you with this, proof of your 32-bit achievement!
─Wonderment Square Staff Member
Defeat all standard rank opponents in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer.

Goodness, those polygonal fists of yours could be considered lethal, to say nothing of your quick reflexes and coordination skills. You're the pointy-headed brawler to beat!
─Wonderment Square Staff Member
Defeat all advanced rank opponents in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer.

Bravo, young man! I knew you were quite the pugilist, but to think you could out-brawl the famed war hero himself─digitized though he is. Now there is no room for doubt: you are the 3D Brawler.
─Dio
Defeat Sephiroth in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer.

Well done, cadet. Your expert piloting skills secured us an important victory this day. Though we may have won the battle, this war is far from over. Join us again soon, and let us bring peace to the galaxy! Rangers, ho!
─Space Rangers Captain
Complete the standard mission in Galactic Saviors at the Gold Saucer.

Your valiant efforts have not only seen us victorious over the Gilgamesh Army, but have brought peace to the galaxy at long last. You are indeed a credit to the space rangers, and a hero whose name will live on!
─Space Rangers Captain
Complete the expert mission in Galactic Saviors at the Gold Saucer.

Nice riding out there, jockey boy. I wish you could have seen the look on Joe's face when you passed him. Should have taken a photo... Oh, well─next time! Anyway, in the market for an exceptionally well-dressed and very professional racing advisor? My schedule's wiiide open, just so you know...!
─Esther
Win the Chocobo Cup at the Gold Saucer.

Congratulations on winning all of our Grade III races. We look forward to your next appearance.
─The GS Chocobo Racing Association
Win all of the Grade III races at the Gold Saucer.

We would like to offer you our most sincere congratulations on winning all of our Grade II races, Mr. Strife. We look forward to your next appearance.
─The GS Chocobo Racing Association
Win all of the Grade II races at the Gold Saucer.

Though it pains me to admit defeat, it would appear that I have no choice in the matter. Congratulations on your victory. I suppose that means Esther was right about you─you're more than just a pretty face. But know this: that trophy will be mine again soon. Keep it well polished for me, would you?
─Joe & Hyperion
Win the Gold Cup at the Gold Saucer.

Congratulations on successfully completing all of our elementary card challenges. Your ability to outmaneuver your opponent, think two moves ahead at all times, and take advantage of the generous amount of luck with which you've been blessed will take you far in this game. We look forward to your continued success.
─Wonderment Square Staff Member
Complete all easy rank card challenges at the Gold Saucer.

Congratulations on successfully completing all of our advanced card challenges. You were able to face down our most grueling bouts with courage, and navigated them all with aplomb. It was a true sanguinary feast for the eyes.
─Wonderment Square Staff Member
Complete all advanced rank card challenges at the Gold Saucer.

Such savagery─such barbarism... Marvelous! You are drawn to the blood, as it is drawn to you, and we applaud you for answering its call with so much...zeal. Continue your quest, darken the crimson stains on your hands with the fresh blood of new victims, and soon you too shall be worthy of praise fit for the queen herself.
─Servant to the Shadowblood Queen
Complete all Survival Challenges at the Gold Saucer.

Talk about a terrific twosome! The trust you two have in each other is damn near palpable! Bet it's seen you through some pretty tough times. Anyway, hold onto what you both've got; a friendship like that doesn't come around often!
─Colosseum Staff Member
Complete all easy rank two-person bouts at the Gold Saucer's Musclehead Colosseum.

Nice musclin' and hustlin' out there, kiddos! Whatever it is you've been through, it's made your bond dang near shatterproof, that's for sure. Your victories─and this little prize─are proof of that. Congrats to you both!
─Colosseum Staff Member
Complete all advanced rank two-person bouts at the Gold Saucer's Musclehead Colosseum.

You lot are a pack of bruisers, I tell you what! Seeing the six of you work together to take down your opponents was a thing of beauty─poetry in motion, really! I couldn't take my eyes off you. Here's to your next round of bouts!
─Colosseum Staff Member
Complete all easy rank six-person team bouts at the Gold Saucer's Musclehead Colosseum.

Excellent work, my scrappy companions! I knew you had it in you. Nothing gets my heart pounding like watching true friends test both their bonds and their brawn in my colosseum! But you must promise me one thing: ensure the ties that bind never fray. Now, say it with me: All for one, and one for all!
─Dio
Complete all advanced rank six-person team bouts at the Gold Saucer's Musclehead Colosseum.

Dear Mr. Strife,
We just wanted to reach out and offer our heartfelt congratulations on your performance as Alphreid. You played him to perfection, and it was a sincere honor to watch you on stage. You were at once dynamic and filled with pathos─you captured our Alphreid perfectly! This is the part you were born to play.

Sincerely,
The Alphreiders
Execute a flawless performance in the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

Salutations Ms. Lockhart,
Your performance as Rosa was, quite simply, sensational─nay! Phenomenal. Or perhaps...transcendent? Yes, that is the word! Know that you have found yourself many an ardent admirer within the Rosa Fan Club. May you continue to grace the stage with your beauty and talent.

With love and adoration,
The Rosalads
Execute a flawless performance in the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

Salutations Ms. Gainsborough,
We, of the Rosa Fan Club, offer you our heartfelt congratulations on your stirring performance as our beloved princess. You are truly worthy of this accolade. It may also please you to know that the song you wrote still echoes in both our ears and our hearts. We will be singing it for a long time to come.

Yours sincerely,
The Rosalads
Execute a flawless performance in the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

Dear Mr. Wallace,
The members of the Varvados Fan Club would like to congratulate you on your epic performance. Your proud, booming voice, coupled with your ability to portray our Dragon King's hidden yearnings made for the perfect Varvados. Few have ever performed the role half so well. We would love to see you on stage again very soon.

Sincerely,
The Varvadosiers
Execute a flawless performance in the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

Yuffie!!!
That was SO good. You killed it! You were all like─I dunno how to explain it─embodying the character and stuff? I mean, yeah, Rosa is meant to be cute or whatever, but she's also, like, cute, y'know? And also kinda badass? Lol I'm rambling. Anywayyy! You were great! You rock! Love ya, girl!

With love,
The Rosalads
Execute a flawless performance in the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

To all Loveless Cast and Crew,
Congratulations on one of your best performances to date. It was such a thrill to see Garm speak for the first time. Your VR technology is certainly pushing the envelope for stagecraft!

Sincerely,
The Loveless Appreciation Society
Execute a flawless performance in the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

Dear Mr. Cait Sith,
Let me just say: I'm a big fan─huge. You have a real knack for storytelling, and I'd go so far as to say that without you, the show wouldn't have been half as good. You inspired me to try my hand at acting too. I've been practicing, actually! Saying "dinnae" instead of "don't," using "lassie" more, etc. Hope we can stand on the same stage together someday!

Yours truly,
The Founding Member of the Cait Sith Fan Club
Execute a flawless performance in the Gold Saucer's rendition of Loveless.

So you made it through a round of Desert Rush. Betcha feelin' real proud of yourself. But don't let it go to your head. That ain't nothin' compared to the hardcore Desert Rush experience.
─Desert Rush Junkie
Complete all three standard levels of Desert Rush in the Dustbowl with the requisite score.

Huh, looks like you ain't all talk. Settin' new records and everything. But just you wait. I'mma put that score to shame and show you who's the real king shit.
─Desert Rush Junkie
Complete all three challenging levels of Desert Rush in the Dustbowl with the requisite score.

Nice one, buddy!
I must say, you put on a fine performance.
Better watch your back, you punk-ass bitch!
─Test 0
Win the Beast Battleground's Sylkis Cup in the Dustbowl.

Ooh wee, buddy, you're super good!
You truly are a sight to behold.
Do the Tentatail Shake!
─Test 0
Win the Beast Battleground's Prison Tourney in the Dustbowl.

Cloud the Knife! Baby, honey, you're too much. Some folks would've been disappointed by your gang's theatrics, but if you ask me, it's already water under the bridge. Or sand in the desert. Whatever, metaphors are hard─but partying ain't! Y'all be sure to join the next one, you hear?
─Solemn Gus
Crash Gus's Party at the Beast Battleground in the Dustbowl and defeat all comers.

This just goes to show that you're the rightful owner of the treasure of the sands. That said, you ever wanna take it up a notch, mister bladesman of legend, be sure to see what else we've got to offer.
─Kid G
Complete Cactuar Crush on Normal mode while searching for the protorelic in the Corel region.

Power! Great! Worthy!
Treasure! Yours! Protect!
Play! Again! Please!
─The Cactuar Coalition
Complete Cactuar Crush on Hard mode while searching for the protorelic in the Corel region.

Beep...boop...
Planetary font restoration complete. All lifestream measurements are within expected parameters. Operation complete.
─Robochad
Complete Gears and Gambits on Hard mode while searching for the protorelic in the Cosmo Canyon region.

Heh, well then. It seems I needn't flag you for immediate disposal. But it should go without saying that I require more data to justify your continued existence. Quality data would be my preference, but failing that, I'll make do with quantity. Try not to die too quickly.
─Hojo AI
Complete the preliminary trials offered by the combat simulator beneath Shinra Manor in Nibelheim.

Zzz... Zzz... Oh, finally finished? Let's see... Huh? What curious data is this? My, you've outdone yourself! In which case...yes, I do believe you've earned yourself the honor of a numerical designation. I reserve them for the specimens that've shown promise, you know. I look forward to sequencing your data and seeing what modifications might suit your offspring. Perhaps the day we welcome them into this world will be sooner than you think!
─Hojo AI
Complete the practical exams offered by the combat simulator beneath Shinra Manor in Nibelheim.

Go, go, you can do it! You can─ Wait, don't tell me you already completed all of Chadley's normal challenges? When did that happen? Oh, never mind. The important thing is that you've given me a ton of data to process! Time to roll up my sleeves and get to work!
─MAI
Complete Chadley's normal combat simulator challenges.

Wow, Cloud! Where did this huge mountain of data come from? Did you really manage to defeat all of these enemies? That's amazing and incredible and wonderful! And...it's also given me more work than I can handle... But it's okay! I'll power through it! Somehow!
─MAI
Complete Chadley's brutal and legendary combat simulator challenges.

Dear Mr. Cloud Strife,
I hope this letter finds you in good health.
Allow me to express my heartfelt gratitude for sharing the gift of music with those around you. The world is a brighter place for your efforts. I only hope that you will continue to seek out and spread beauty in your travels.

Sincerely,
Piano Outreach Association Representative
Dorian
Achieve an A rank in performances of the six compositions selected by the Piano Outreach Association and report your accomplishments to Dorian.

From the sweeping plains of the grasslands to the striking vistas of Corel. The lush forests of Gongaga. The timeless features of Cosmo Canyon, the towering crags of Mt. Nibel, and beyond...
How did it feel to see so much of the world? Through the lens and with the naked eye? Only you can know...
─Snaps
Use Photo Mode to take a picture at every scenic spot and report your accomplishments to Snaps.

To the Blood Champion Cloud Strife,
You have done what I could not. The Queen dreams her dreamless sleep, and the players no longer need fear her curse.

And so the game is once again merely a game. No more, no less. As it was and should always be.

I pray these trials have not deprived you of your love for the cards, and I hope that somewhere, someday, we may enjoy a spirited rematch.

Ever your friendly specter,
Lidrehl
Attain the highest possible rank in Queen's Blood.

Hello Cloud,
I hope you're doing well and enjoying success in your various endeavors.
I'm...struggling to readjust to life in the office. Day after day of harsh demands and unreasonable expectations from my superiors. But while a part of me will always yearn for the warmth of the Gold Saucer's bright lights, I know my place is here, fighting the good fight for my direct reports. Nevertheless, I'll cherish the memories we shared─and I'm already planning to take a trip out there with the family the next time I can get a chunk of time off.
Never stop partying, my fellow party animal.

Best wishes,
The Former UPA and Forever Shinra Middle Manager
Rise to the challenge of the Shinra middle manager and claim the title of Ultimate Party Animal in the Gold Saucer.

Wow, Captain, you're a wiz with a camera! We can't thank you enough. Next time, though, you gotta get in on the shot with us!
─Midgar Seventh Infantry Troopers
Take a quality photo of the Shinra troopers participating in the inauguration parade in Junon.

I finally got all the mooglets to start pulling their weight, kupo! But mark my words: this is only the beginning of our mercantile empire! I mean, uh...our story, kupo! Be sure to drop by often and buy heaps!
─Moogle Merchant
Raise the merchant rank of the moogle emporiums to maximum.

You bow-wow-wowed me, "Captain"! Hahaha! Who's the "good boy who never stops," the song asks! Why, it's you, my friend! You! And for a man of such accomplished leadership, there is no more fitting a gift than this.
─Roche, SOLDIER 3-C
Ensure that all the Seventh Infantry troopers reach the port alive following the failed assassination attempt on Rufus in Junon.

Well, well, well, kupo.
What is this extraordinarily rare creature I spy? I must admit, I am intrigued. If only I could get my hands on it─take a peek beneath the fluffy exterior and see what makes it tick...

─Hojo, Director of Research and Development
Destroy ten or more supply crates on the conveyor belt in Shinra Manor.

Found yourself my bird, did you? Someone's got a nose for the finer things in life. 'Course, there's no substitute for the genuine article. If you're ever itchin' to fly high, send up smoke. I'll treat you right.
─President Cid Highwind, Bronco Airlines
Find and excavate a particular rabbit burrow with a chocobo in the grasslands.

This particular design was produced by none other than the Gold Saucer's very own director. The redoubtable buggy fears neither sand nor sludge as it charges through the desert, its fiery body emblazoned with a lightning motif that bespeaks unbridled passion. Why, if one were to run full speed through the sandbox with it in hand, I daresay they'd feel as though they were the wind itself!
─Dio
Find and excavate a particular rabbit burrow with a chocobo in the Gongaga region.

What better way to pursue your beloved than with the aid of a wheelie? And what better way to preserve your romantic memories than by taking your trusty steed home with you? With a wheelie of your own, you and your partner can relive your time in Costa del Sol whenever you wish.
─Costa del Amor Executive Committee
Find and excavate a particular rabbit burrow with a chocobo in the Corel region.

Ever wonder what's inside those Shinra boxes you see around town? Ever get the uncontrollable urge to crack one open, even if it might get you arrested and aggressively interrogated? Wonder and worry no longer─get your very own Shinra box! You can open and close it to your heart's content!
─Public Security Officer
Find and excavate a particular rabbit burrow with a chocobo in the Cosmo Canyon region.

It's nice when you can grab a drink at a vending machine and just relax for a bit. Forget about everything and take a breather. Shame they don't have a changing room and shower, though. Sometimes I'd kill for one of those.
─Tifa
Find and excavate a particular rabbit burrow with a chocobo in the Junon region.

I personally oversaw the development of this little darling. It boasts a plethora of refinements, all of which are proprietary secrets. So know that if you dare to disassemble it in some vain attempt to reverse engineer our technology, there will be...repercussions.
─Scarlet, Director of Advanced Weaponry
Find and excavate a particular rabbit burrow with a chocobo in the Nibel region.

Kweh? You wanna go for a ride? Or find a shady spot to curl up for a nap?
─Chocobo
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

BOOM!
Haha! Had you going there for a minute, didn't I? Just playing with ya. I won't go boom. OR WILL I!?
─Bomb
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

Brave cadets like you are the backbone of the space rangers. So long as you're willing to give it your all, I truly believe there's no enemy we can't defeat. Join us, my friend, and we'll give the galaxy's villains what for!
─Space Rangers Captain
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

Our starfighters are the unquestioned masters of space combat, built to empower our peerless pilots to bring hope to the far reaches of the galaxy. As we stand poised to venture into our most pivotal battle yet, we know that you, cadet, will make us proud. For peace and justice for all!
─Space Rangers Captain
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

My belly's not full of food but sweet dreams, kweh. When you're feeling sad or lonely, just give me a great big hug and I'll make it all better. That's a promise.
─Fat Chocobo
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

It is an honor to be given the opportunity to play the part of Rosa. To fulfill my lifelong dream of standing on stage and performing in front of everyone...there's no words to describe what this means to me.

I hope that you'll join me on Rosa's emotional journey, for you're as much a part of her story as I am.

With love,
Jessie
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

Knife is for stabbing. People for cursing.
But not you. You are a friend. My one and only friend. Right...?
─Tonberry
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

You! Me! Friend!
Lies! Never! Ever!
Or else! Ten thousand! Needles!
─Cactuar
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

Pleased to make your acquaintance! I'm a genuine bona fide save crystal, yessir! (Though some folks used to call me a save point back in the day too.)
Whether you're far from home, getting up to mischief, or have the sinking feeling you're about to get your butt whooped, gimme a holler! Better safe than sorry, am I right?
Anyway, I'll probably see you again somewhere down the road. Take care!
─Save Crystal/Point, Beginner's Hall
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

That sleek, confident design! That booming exhaust! Perfection! Even now I can hear the sweet engine note resounding in my ear─can't you? Truly, this masterpiece will be an integral part of our inevitable rendezvous, my friend.
─Roche, SOLDIER: Third Class
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

Inspired by the legend of the Shadowblood Queen, my new game rewards players who strategize and act decisively, while still being simple enough that anyone can pick it up easily. The exquisite card artwork is also something I believe you will all appreciate, as it draws you in and immerses you in the world of Queen's Blood.
─Lidrehl Balmon, Creator of Queen's Blood
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

By popular demand, the gallant SOLDIER operator who delighted the crowds in 3D Brawler makes his toy debut! With his steely gaze and spiky hair, he cuts a dashing figure on the digital battlefield.
─Shinra Toys
Purchase with GP at a Gold Saucer exchange kiosk.

Pardon me? You wish to have a memento of our meeting? Very well, if you'll just hold that signboard firmly...
First, a dazzling D!
Then, an immaculate I!
Finally, an opulent O!
I see you and your canvas managed to weather my furious penmanship. Be proud, and enjoy your priceless treasure.
─Dio
Complete all the bouts at the Gold Saucer's Musclehead Colosseum to unlock, and purchase with GP at an exchange kiosk.

Fans of the Punishing Pugilist can at last add him to their figurine collection! Place him in your room as a trophy commemorating the beatdown you dished out!
─Shinra Toys
Defeat the saucer brawler in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer to unlock, and purchase with GP at an exchange kiosk.

Is his belly truly soft, or does it hide abs of steel? Now you can find out for yourself by squeezing your very own Colossal Cuddler. Snuggle up to this fearsome fighter today!
─Shinra Toys
Defeat the fat moogle in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer to unlock, and purchase with GP at an exchange kiosk.

The time has come, and so has the Beefcake Park Director! When this executive jumps into the ring, the crowd knows they're in for a show like no other. Own the living legend and reenact all of your favorite classic matches!
─Shinra Toys
Defeat Dio in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer to unlock, and purchase with GP at an exchange kiosk.

Brace for absolute zero! When the Numb-Knuckled Queen descends from on high, you'd better bundle up. Even in her 3D Brawler form, there's no denying the power of this ice-cold killer's beauty.
─Shinra Toys
Defeat Shiva in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer to unlock, and purchase with GP at an exchange kiosk.

The Burning Bruiser has made the leap from the 3D Brawler world into our own! Ifrit's mere presence is enough to summon the unquenchable flames of hell. This high-quality figurine will dominate your collection as its unspoken roar resounds throughout your room!
─Shinra Toys
Defeat Ifrit in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer to unlock, and purchase with GP at an exchange kiosk.

This replica of the war hero Sephiroth's massive sword has been crafted with admiration and respect. The dimensions, edge pattern, handle wrapping and more have all been painstakingly reproduced, resulting in a weapon that will satisfy even the most demanding collectors. For a magnificent, alluring masterpiece befitting a legend, only the best will suffice.
─Shinra Toys
Defeat Sephiroth in 3D Brawler at the Gold Saucer to unlock, and purchase with GP at an exchange kiosk.
