Your reputation as a party animal has grown.
Take on the UPA's Galactic Saviors challenge.
The others went off to have fun.
Cait Sith's equipment was returned to you.
The clerk appears to be absent.
Use the guide moogle to go to Battle Square.
Go to the scene of the crime.
Participate in the match once you are prepared.
Look for Dio in the other squares.
Only hotel guests can use the elevator.
You cannot climb up here right now.
You successfully arrested the insurgent leader.
You allowed the president to be attacked.
The security system is preventing it from opening.
Defeat the fiends around the magonga mushroom.
Use your chocobo's sense of smell to find the next mushroom.
Follow the map and gather the requested materials.
You should be able to find what Izo wanted here.
Use Torgan's drawing (<button=Left>) to find the correct rock salt.

You do not have enough rock salt yet.
Keep looking.
Defeat the threat you spotted through the binoculars.
Defeat the threat you spotted through the binoculars.
Yuffie restored Sotetsu to full health.
Protect Melon and defeat the fiends.
Have Torgan's dog Melon lead you to the salt.
Follow Red XIII and look for the chickens.
You do not have enough gil to pay the pilot's fee.
Torgan will be furious if you stomp around his vegetable patch.
Red XIII went to look for the chickens.
You should be able to find the rock salt here.
Ride your chocobo to Magon Hill to pick magonga mushrooms.
<button=RS> Look for anything out of the ordinary.
Allow Melon to guide you to the salt deposits.

You restored power to the pump.
Access the water level control terminal.

The power cable is not long enough.
Search for a way to connect it.
You need to supply power to the pump first. Look for a power cable to connect.
The gate does not have enough power. Look for a power cable to connect.

The pump does not have enough power.
Look for a power cable to connect.
Beck's Badasses are no longer on alert.
Sneak past Beck's Badasses to reach the warehouse.
Find a way to drop the box suspended above the Badasses.
Use your chocobo's sense of smell to find the hideout key.
Beck's Badasses are busy playing dead.
Your chocobo picked up the key's scent.
<button=RS> Expose the Bandit Hiding the Protorelic
Focus on preparing for the parade.
You received a reward for taking a good picture.
You rounded up all of the Seventh Infantry units. Report to the commander.
You rounded up the requisite five units for the parade.
Best not to get any closer.
Round up the drill team and report to the commander.
Organize the drill team and report to the commander.
Rendezvous with the others at the port.
Board the ship from the rear cargo entrance.
Search for a Shinra trooper uniform.
Get changed into the spare fatigues.
Climb higher and search for a vantage point.
There do not appear to be any Queen's Blood players around.
Investigate the commotion on the beach.
The staff appear to be on break.
The others decided to explore the town.
Rest at the inn once you have finished gathering information.
Take a seat at rest stops to recover your HP and MP.
Defeat the fiends attacking the cow.
Hell Rider II fully recovered its HP.
Gabe has finished repairing the carriage.
Your chocobo is too scared to enter the cave. Dismount first.
Hop on a chocobo and explore the world.
You completed all Fort Condor intel objectives on Hard mode.
There seems to be a fiend nearby.
You cannot enter the children's hideout right now.
The Ribbiting Rollers stage is now available.
Defeat the threat and retrieve the condor's dinner.
You gave Rhonda's gil to Dillan and Claire.
Protect Salmon and defeat the fiends.
Salmon headed for the village entrance.
Defeat the enemies and pursue Hell Rider II.
You cannot enter the Crow's Nest right now.
Talk to Rhonda in Under Junon.
You have obtained everything on the wainwright's list.
Use the wainwright's note (<button=Left>) to sniff out the materials he needs.
He shows no signs of waking up.
You placed the condor's food on the pedestal.
Obtained chocobo gear designed by Kyrie.
You cannot go any farther in this demo.
The captured captain holds the protorelic.

Your investigations are complete!
Now head for the city of Junon.
Bring up the rear and ensure the others make it safely through.
Talk to Virgil at the clock tower.
Talk to Thorin at the card shop outside Kalm.
Try challenging Queen's Blood players in town.
Obtained a Queen's Blood starter deck.
Reunite with the others beneath the inn.
Go to the clock tower when you are ready.
Best to steer clear of troopers.
Best to leave them alone for now.
Use the scaffolding to bypass the Shinra troopers.
You cannot leave Kalm right now.

Midgar is still on lockdown.
Avoid Shinra's checkpoint.
Stay hidden and eavesdrop on the conversation.

The ladder is broken.
Find another way to get up to the bridge.
Dropping something heavy on the container may be enough to dislodge it.
Push the cart off the ledge.
There's nothing more to talk about.
Let Sephiroth discuss the matter with the mayor in private.
The cable is not long enough. Look for another way through and continue clearing the mako gas.
Use the purifier connected to this mako processing unit.
Rest at the inn once you are done exploring.
Search for a way to get rid of the gas.
You need Deputy Commissioner Murasaki's ID card.
Take a seat at rest stops to recover your HP and MP.
To set materia, press <button=pause-menu> and access the Materia & Equipment menu.
Search for something to climb up on.

Skip the Trek

Forgo the climb up Mt. Nibel and jump straight to the mako reactor?
The taste reminds you of home.
You will not have room for supper tonight.

FINAL FANTASY VII REBIRTH Demo saved data confirmed.

Players who have completed the demo can skip the mako reactor investigation and resume play from the village.

Note that skipping will not affect gameplay.

Skip to the village?
Go see what that noise was.
Head to the reactor via the new bridge.
Make for the reactor to find Murasaki.
You cannot go any farther in this demo.
You restored power to the facility.
Explore the village and prepare for tomorrow's mission.
Sephiroth is holed up in Shinra Manor. Follow the path left out of the rear gate.
Explore the village until Cait Sith is finished.
Speak with the others once you are ready.
Head to the reactor via the gate on the south side of the village.
Touch the blue portion of the touch pad indicated on the screen and hold down <button=touch,pad> to begin aiming.
When Target Line Turns Blue, Release to Throw
The door to the simulator's control room opened.
The door to Hojo's secret laboratory opened.
A new trial was added to Hojo's combat simulator.
You disengaged the lock with the security card.
You completed all preliminary trials in the simulator.
You completed all evaluations in the simulator.
This quest is no longer available.
Speak with Chloe to hear the details.
Head to the Wildflower Plateau to pick flowers for Chloe.
Check Chloe's <color=yellow-black>flower crown doodle</color> and pick suitable flowers.
Return to Chloe and hand over the flowers you collected.

Through the simple act of making a flower crown for Billy, Chloe manages to lift her brother's spirits. While none can say what the future holds for the pair, they seem better prepared to face it together.
Defeat the fiends in the flower field.

Got beat bad at Queen's Blood, but the real stinger was when I had to give up the rare card I'd staked on the match. I'm looking for a pro to win it back on my behalf. If you think you've got what it takes, drop by the bar.
Speak with the bartender to hear the details.
Defeat Vash in a game of Queen's Blood.
Find Virgil at the clock tower and win back the Chocobo & Moogle card through a game of Queen's Blood.
Head to Thorin's Card Shop and win back the Chocobo & Moogle card through a game of Queen's Blood.
Return to Vash and hand over the Chocobo & Moogle card.

Having been reunited with his beloved Chocobo & Moogle card, Vash treats Cloud and Tifa to a complimentary drink. The cocktail, as it happens, is one that Tifa knows all too well, and hopes she can make again one day when she has another bar of her own.
The card has been added to your key items.

The mako pipeline upon which Kalm and her people rely has sprung a leak, and we are in desperate need of a technician─or failing that, someone with a modicum of skill─to perform emergency repairs. The welfare of our residents hangs in the balance!
The locations of the parts have been added to the map.
You don't have the requisite parts to fix the pipe.
Head to the mako pipeline maintenance warehouse and finish the repairs the "hotshot mercenary" started.

Gather the parts needed to repair the mako pipeline.

1-3 Slabs of Rusted Sheet Metal
2-5 Corroded Nails

A minimum of 1 slab of rusted sheet metal and 2 corroded nails are required to perform repairs.
Return to the mayor of Kalm and inform him that the repairs are complete.
Defeat the fiends around the pipeline.
Speak with the mayor of Kalm to hear the details.
Deliver the mayor's message to the "hotshot mercenary" at the mako pipeline maintenance warehouse.

Gather the parts needed to repair the mako pipeline.

1-3 Slabs of Rusted Sheet Metal
2-5 Corroded Nails

A minimum of 1 slab of rusted sheet metal and 2 corroded nails are required to perform repairs.
Inspect the mako pipeline with Kyrie and make the necessary repairs.
Return to the mayor of Kalm and inform him that the repairs are complete.

The mako pipeline has been restored─no thanks to a certain self-proclaimed merc. The mayor could not care less about Kyrie now that the problem has been resolved, but Cloud cannot shake the feeling that he has not seen the last of the troublemaker.
The locations of the parts have been added to the map.
Defeat the fiends and secure the area.

A clever fiend of some sort's been preying on my livestock of late, and if I can't put a stop to it, my farm's doomed. Seems clear a run-of-the-mill hunter won't cut it, so I'm in the market for a merc with solid tracking skills.
Speak with the farmer to hear the details.
Head to where Oliver's livestock were attacked and look for clues.
Summon Piko and use him to search for the perpetrator's scent trail.
Use Piko to follow the perpetrator's scent trail.
Continue relying upon Piko to follow the perpetrator's scent trail.
Dispatch the fiend that has been preying on Oliver's livestock.
Return to Oliver and inform him that the fiend has been dealt with.

The fiend that preyed upon Oliver's livestock is no more, but Red XIII is nevertheless disappointed in his inability to track down the culprit on his own. Fortunately, all it takes to lift his spirits is a mouthwatering reward from the grateful rancher.
Investigate the Scene of the Attack
Search the Area with a Chocobo

A good friend of mine's in need of assistance with a repair job, but with my health troubles, I fear I'd do more harm than good. If you're willing to lend her a hand in my stead, come and see me at the inn. And quickly, please.
Return to the Inn at Kalm and inform the hotel staff that the windmill has been repaired.
Return to the Inn at Kalm
Speak with the client to hear the details.
Speak with Broden to hear the details.
Speak with Mildred on Broden's behalf and offer your assistance.

To craft the component required to repair the windmill, you must first obtain a windmill gear transmuter chip.

*You can ascertain the location of the transmuter chip through lifespring analysis.

To craft the windmill gear, you must procure the following parts:

1 Quetzalcoatl Talon
2 Chunks of Iron Ore
1 Chunk of Lea Titanium
5 Beast Bones
Use the materials you have procured to transmute a windmill gear and deliver it to Mildred.
Return to Broden and inform him that the windmill has been repaired.

The republic windmill is up and running again, and Mildred couldn't be more pleased─unless Broden were there to share in the moment, that is. Alas, while they once had plans to travel the world together, it seems unlikely they'll be able to do so anytime soon...

You already have the transmuter chip.
Transmute a windmill gear and give it to Mildred.

Beck's Business wants YOU! We are currently recruiting respectable businessmen and women eager to engage in respectable business activities. Salary is commiserate on performance; we offer commissary compensation. Work hard and you'll make bank! Drop by our recruitment center and submit your application today!
Speak with the company representatives to hear the details.
Find and dispatch the fiends congregating on the old highway outside of Kalm.

Beck's Business was not meant to be. For better or for worse, the former badasses cannot bring themselves to turn over a new leaf, and have once more embraced the outlaw lifestyle by forming a biker gang. The recently hired Cloud is summarily fired, but he will surely land on his feet.

Been making deliveries since way back when, but now that one of my carriage's wheels broke, I've had to suspend service. If I could get my hands on a replacement, I suppose I could fix the damn thing, but honestly, maybe this is all for the best...
Speak with the ranch owner to hear the details.
To climb the mountain and reach the wainwright's hut, you must first capture the chocobo Belle.
Ride Belle to reach the hut atop the mountain and obtain the parts needed to repair Gabe's carriage from the wainwright.

Gather the materials listed in the wainwright's note.

1-3 Pieces of Dried Driftwood

A minimum of 1 piece of dried driftwood is required for the wainwright to begin his work.
Return to the wainwright and hand over whatever driftwood you managed to find.
Return to Gabe and hand over the carriage parts.

Not only has Gabe's chocobo carriage been repaired, but the once-dispirited man has rediscovered his lost passion for his delivery service. Aerith may claim she only did it for the chocobos, but it's far from the first time she felt compelled to try and brighten someone's day.
I'm looking to hire a bodyguard. My boy Salmon needs to make a delivery, and I don't want a fiend even looking at him the wrong way. Come and see me if you're interested.
Speak with Rhonda to hear the details.
Rendezvous with the dog Salmon at the angler's stowage so you can escort him to his destination.
Accompany Salmon to his destination and defend him from any fiends that appear.

With Cloud and company's help, Salmon delivers the money to Dillan, ensuring that he and his partner Claire will have more than enough money to care for their soon-to-be-born child. Clearly, despite having grown apart, Rhonda still cares deeply for her son.

So there's this lighthouse that's my favorite hangout spot, but now some rando calling themselves the "Merc of Junon" has rolled up and claimed it as their new HQ. I don't know what their deal is, but they're sure not doing jack about the fiends in the area, so I'd love it if someone could tell 'em to, you know, beat it or whatever.
Speak with Toby to hear the details.
Head to the abandoned lighthouse currently occupied by the self-proclaimed Merc of Junon.
Search for the Merc of Junon and see what their intentions are.
Deal with the fiends drawn to the lighthouse by Kyrie's obnoxious advertising.

Toby may be something of a character, but Kyrie has him beat by far. The "Merc of Junon" unintentionally transformed the lighthouse into a lightning rod for fiends, but Cloud and his comrades manage to drive them off─and save Kyrie from the consequences of her obnoxious advertising.

Our beloved condor has not graced the skies above Junon in quite some time. We worry for her welfare and wish to hire someone to prepare a culinary feast that she will find too tempting to resist. Those willing to provide assistance are invited to join us on Condor Hill.
Speak with the society members to hear the details.
To procure suitable bait for the condor, you must first capture a chocobo adept at traversing the mountains.
Head to the condor's hunting spot and search for promising prey.
Use Belle to follow your quarry's scent trail.
Use Belle to follow the fiend's scent trail and claim your stolen prize.
Continue your pursuit of the fiend that stole the condor's dinner.
Return to Colin and hand over the bait you procured for the condor.

The beloved condor of Junon has been sighted once more, and Colin and his fellow watchers are overjoyed. There is no telling when the magnificent creature will return, but at least the society can rest easy knowing that she is alive and well.
Ribbit ribbit, ribbit ribbit ribbit? Ribbit! Ribbit ribbit. Ribbit ribbit ribbit, ribbit!
Speak with the Frogmaster to hear the details.

Not many have had the privilege to see the world through the eyes of a frog, but Cloud and Tifa can now count themselves among those blessed few. Indeed, the experience has taught them that a ribbit is worth a thousand words.

Grown-ups have been talking about war with Wutai a lot lately, and it's really getting my friends down. I wanna try and take their minds off it all─do something fun─but I'm not sure what. If anyone has ideas, I'm all ears.
Speak with Priscilla to hear the details.
Raise the children's spirits by working with Mr. Dolphin to perform a variety of tricks.

War may yet come to Junon, but for a time, Priscilla and her friends are not burdened by such worries. The acrobatic feats of Cloud and Mr. Dolphin delight one and all. Unfortunately for Yuffie, however, the children have not a single materia between them, and cannot pay her exorbitant price for the show.

Be advised: a fearsome fiend is presently contained within Crater Cape. Civilians are strongly encouraged to avoid this area until the threat has been addressed. Active duty and retired military are requested to render assistance.
Speak with the members of the Seventh Infantry to hear the details.
See to your preparations and join the Seventh Infantry troopers when you are ready to help them dispatch the fiend.
Assist the Seventh Infantry in dispatching the dangerous fiend.
Use a chocobo to search for the Hell Rider II's scent trail.
Continue relying upon your chocobo to follow the Hell Rider II's scent trail.

Officially, the Hell Rider II is dispatched by Midgar's Seventh Infantry. While they received assistance from a certain party of fugitives, the commander is willing to let their part in the effort remain a secret. It goes without saying that other Shinra forces may not be so willing to look the other way...
Track Down the Hell Rider II

Johnny's Seaside Inn is currently undergoing a complete renovation to better cater to you, our beloved customers! And, uh...we could use a little help. Help that isn't me. And by "me" I mean "we." And by "we" I mean...uh, it'll be easier to explain when you meet the gang. And by "you" I mean my one true bro, Cloud! Don't leave me hanging!
Costa del Sol - Johnny's Seaside Inn
Speak with Johnny to hear the details.
Head to the Costa Falls and look for the industrious Johnnys.

Search the area around the ziplines and recover the refurbishment materials dropped by the Johnnys.

A minimum of 4 bundles of material are required for the inn's refurbishment.
Return to the Johnnys and hand over whatever refurbishment materials you managed to find.
Head to the factory ruins and look for the gregarious Johnnys.

Search the vicinity for the ruins of the republic-era valve factory.

*You can ascertain the location of the factory ruins through lifespring analysis.
To track down the transmuter chip, you must first procure a chocobo at the Rent-a-Bird Stables.

To craft the boiler valve, you must first obtain a boiler valve transmuter chip.

*You can ascertain the location of the transmuter chip and unearth it with a chocobo.

Procure the necessary materials and transmute a boiler valve, then deliver it to the Johnnys at the factory ruins.

5 Chunks of Iron Ore
2 Chunks of Zinc Ore
2 Amethysts
Head toward the desert and look for the enterprising Johnny.
Steal the Tonberry King's crown and deliver it to the Johnny at the desert's edge. You may deliver a pristine or marred crown.
Return to Johnny Prime and inform him that his clones' myriad requests have been addressed.

Johnny is a man who shoots for the stars─seven, to be precise. Whether or not his Seaside Inn will ever be graced with such a bounty remains to be seen, but his one true bro proves instrumental in helping him (and his clones) make great strides toward realizing their dream.
Track Down the Johnnys at the Costa Falls
Track Down the Johnnys at the Factory Ruins
Track Down the Johnny in the Desert
Steal and Deliver the Tonberry King's Crown
The Saga of the Seaside Inn

Hey lovebirds, we need your help in creating our next line of classic swimwear! All you have to do is go on a very special date we've planned that's sure to bring you and your partner closer together than ever. So come and see us on the beach if you're in the mood for romance!
Speak with the three fashionistas to hear the details.
Follow the fashionistas' date plan and play Run Wild and Pirate's Rampage with Aerith.
Find Yorda at the Rent-a-Bird Stables to learn about the next part of your date plan.
Mount a chocobo and ride with Aerith to Clamshell Beach.
Use your chocobo to search the beach for the largest shell you can find. If you so desire, you may find two additional ones.
Return to Yorda and hand over whichever shell you think will impress her.
Return to Costa Beach and watch the fashionistas unveil their new swimwear designs.

Inspiration comes in many forms. The three fashionistas needed to observe a couple on a date, and Aerith and Cloud rise to the occasion. The dazzling designs the women subsequently produced bespeak the colorful dynamic between the merc and the florist.
Check Out Fran and Naomi's Date Activities

It's time to muscle maximize─or at least it was, until a bunch of fiends showed up and started scaring our members. Even the most passionate builder would struggle to get into a rhythm with those things hanging around, so we need an able-bodied merc to come save the day─and our gains.
Speak with Jules to hear the details.
Track down and dispatch the fiends lurking near the bodybuilders' training gym.
Return to Jules and inform him that the fiends are no longer a threat.
Defeat Amina in a crunch-off and claim your reward.

Sculpting one's body into a work of art requires an environment free of distractions and thus free of fiends. Thankfully, the bodybuilders are able to resume their sacred pursuit once more─and their newest member, Amina, has the opportunity to challenge Tifa to a sit-up contest. Though she loses, Amina is inspired to train even harder to live up to her idol's example.
Defeat the Fiends near the Training Gym

One of the robed fellows I've been looking after has been abducted. Whatever damn fool that did it left behind a note demanding money, but I'm in no position to pay. There's no telling what'll happen to the man if I don't, though, so if someone out there's willing to track down and rescue the poor bastard, you'd be doing us both a favor.
Speak with Dr. Sheiran to hear the details.
Trust in Red's talents and follow the robed man's scent trail.
Search for the chocobo carriage that the outdoorsman saw transporting the robed man.
Use Dr. Sheiran's UV-A flashlight to search for the robed man's sweat droplets.
Search the vicinity for a means to open the shutter and resume your pursuit.
Search the hideout for the robed man and the kidnappers.
Return to Dr. Sheiran with the robed man.

The robed man has been rescued and delivered into the care of Dr. Sheiran once more. However, the kidnappers' comments about SOLDIER degradation are a dark reminder of how little is known about the treatment Cloud underwent, and how the long-term effects remain unclear to this day.
Mr. Birdie didn't come home for dinner, and no one knows where he is! We're worried something bad might've happened to him. Can anyone help us find him? Please?
Speak with Mr. Birdie's buddies to hear the details.

To craft the bird traps required to capture Cloud Jr., you must first obtain a bird trap transmuter chip.

*You can ascertain the location of the transmuter chip through lifespring analysis.

To craft the bird traps required to capture Cloud Jr., you must first obtain a bird trap transmuter chip.

*You can ascertain the location of the transmuter chip and unearth it with a chocobo.

Procure the necessary materials and transmute bird traps, then place the traps in the old republic birdhouses.

5 Sprigs of Sage
3 Handfuls of Mist Seeds
3 Sprigs of Marjoram
Return to one of the bird traps you set and see if Cloud Jr. has been caught.
Return to another of the bird traps you set and see if Cloud Jr. has been caught.
Return to the remaining bird trap you set and see if Cloud Jr. has been caught.
Return to the children and confirm that Cloud Jr. made it back safely.

To the relief of the children who love and adore him, the incorrigible Cloud Jr. has returned safe and sound. The episode spurs Barret to reflect on how he hopes to bring Marlene home one day, though it might force him to explain the tragic circumstances of their departure years ago...

It is my solemn charge to keep our slice of beachside paradise free from all manner of unpleasantness. To that end, I employed a freelancer to resolve a simple matter...which they have failed to do in a timely fashion. And so I must once more seek outside assistance─this time to deal with two problems. Rest assured you will be well compensated.
Costa del Sol - Bar del Sol
Speak with Mayor Kapono to hear the details.
Find the freeloading merc at the bar on Costa Beach.

To transmute the legendary bait needed to lure out and dispatch fiends on the off-limits beach, you must procure the following materials:

1 Great Malboro Tendril
1 Jabberwock Horn
5 Pearl Ginger Roots
5 Ether Onions
Return to Costa Beach and impress upon Kyrie that her chicanery has consequences.
Return to Mayor Kapono and inform him that both the fiends and Kyrie will no longer be a problem.

Kyrie's shenanigans have finally caught up with her. After dealing with the fiends she promised to cull, Cloud informs her that Mayor Kapono instructed him to "take care" of her. The timely arrival of her grandmother Mireille spares her that fate, as the pair agree to work as partners and subsequently left. Coincidentally, the mayor is later the victim of a theft─the work of two "Angels of the Slums," no doubt...
Defeat the Fiends on the Off-Limits Beach

Hey Cloud, if you're reading this and I haven't told you in person yet─we got permission to race in the Gold Cup! It's a major racing event and a real honor, believe me. When you're ready to challenge the best of the best, I'll be waiting for you in Chocobo Square!
Speak with Billy to hear the details.
Compete in chocobo racing's prestigious Gold Cup and claim the grand prize.

Cloud's victory in the Gold Cup earns him accolades, but the greater prize is the truth about Billy's parents─about Corneo's villainy and Sam's attempts to honor their wishes. Saddened yet proud, the boy vows to carry on their legacy and continue to care for chocobos.

Everyone's favorite dustbowl asshole is throwing a "party," and there's a "prize" up for grabs that I need to win. So I joined the festivities─several times─but just couldn't hack it. "We'll meet again"─that's what she tried to tell me, but I guess it's you I hope I'll meet again first, merc. Come and find me, please.
Speak with Gus's party guest to hear the details.
Speak with the Beast Battleground gatekeeper to participate in the competition.
As Yuffie, face off against Gus's monstrous party guests.
As Aerith, face off against Gus's fiery party guests.
As Barret, face off against Gus's feathery party guests.
As Tifa, face off against one of Gus's mechanical party guests.
As Cloud, face off against Gus's most terrifying party guest.

At Leslie's behest, Cloud and his comrades join the festivities in the Beast Battleground. Though they defeat their opponents, the grand prize turns out not to be his missing beloved, Merle. Nevertheless, Leslie remains hopeful that they will one day be reunited.

I've been striving to create the greatest weapon that ever was, but despite my best efforts, I've yet to make any meaningful progress. There's an essential element I'm missing, the seed of inspiration─but I know it's out there! I just need something or someone to help me grasp it!
Speak with the weaponsmith to hear the details.
Head to Izo's shed and look for the map you need to obtain the materials the weaponsmith requires.
Follow Izo's <color=blue>draconite map</color> to reach the area where you can procure the necessary draconite ore.
Search the area for draconite deposits and collect the required quantity.
Return to Izo and hand over the hunks of draconite ore he requested.

Izo's masterpiece is complete, and Barret is the owner of a brand-new weapon. A gift, the smith explains, for a man he believes will strive to do good deeds...and one day perhaps lay down his weapons once and for all.
I'm looking for someone to teach me the ways of the warrior─to help me reach my full potential! No matter the suffering, no matter the sacrifice, I'm willing to do whatever it takes!
Speak with the youth coalition rookie to hear the details.
Gird your loins for a grueling training session and speak with Sotetsu when you are ready to begin.
As Yuffie's second disciple, accompany Sotetsu and help facilitate his training.
As Yuffie's second disciple, accompany Sotetsu and help facilitate his training.
As Yuffie's second disciple, accompany Sotetsu and help facilitate his training.
As Yuffie's second disciple, accompany Sotetsu and help facilitate his training.
Follow Sotetsu back to the village and attempt to secure Master Yuffie's due compensation.

In the end, Sotetsu and the GYC decline Yuffie's offer of further training, as Cissnei offers to provide free instruction. While Gongaga's defenders were willing to part with a surprising amount of gil, materia is the dealbreaker. Alas, Master Yuffie will have to look elsewhere for disciples.
Assist with Master Yuffie's First Lesson
Assist with Master Yuffie's Second Lesson
Assist with Master Yuffie's Third Lesson
Assist with Master Yuffie's Fourth Lesson

Gongaga mushroom soup may seem like a simple dish to most people, but making it is harder than you'd expect. My attempts aren't coming together, and the flavor is always just a little bit off. I don't know if something's missing, or if I added one too many ingredients, or what...
Speak with Cissnei to hear the details.
Head to the village entrance and look for the peddler selling Torgan's wares.
Follow Torgan's loyal companion back to his owner's farm.

Gather Gongaga rock salt and magonga mushrooms in accordance with Torgan's instructions.

*Melon can guide you to salt deposits.
*Head to Magon Hill and use a chocobo to begin searching for magonga mushrooms.
Return to Cissnei and hand over the ingredients you gathered.

It was a mighty struggle, but with Cloud and Aerith's help, Cissnei manages to make a proper mushroom soup. She intends to bring it to her next dinner with the Fairs, and unlike previous attempts, is confident that this batch won't pose a health risk.

You wouldn't believe the state of my chicken coop! Poked full of fresh holes because of that black stuff from the reactor. Some were big enough for my little dears to wriggle through and run off, and now I'm scrambling to track them down before some beastie gets to them first. Oh, if only a kind soul would come and lend me a hand...
Speak with Grandma Hen to hear the details.
Use Kazhra's feed clanger to lure the wayward chickens back to the coop.
Trust in Red's talents and follow Pippily's scent trail.
Use Kazhra's feed clanger to lure the wayward Pippily back to the coop.
Return to Kazhra and confirm that all her beloved chickens are present and accounted for.

As thanks for rounding up her flock, Kazhra treats Cloud and Red XIII to a fresh serving of grilled chicken. With a heavy heart, they dine on what was once Pippily as they contemplate the circle of life. Afterwards, Red honors the chicken's delicious sacrifice with a mournful howl.

Attention GYC members─as you may have heard, we've received reports of especially dangerous fiends near the village. I've decided to personally look into this, so I'll be heading to the observation tower. Unit leaders are in charge while I'm away.
Speak with Cissnei to hear the details.
Head to the observation tower and use Cissnei's binoculars to look for anything out of the ordinary.
Head to the spot where you saw suspicious activity and search for fiends.
Return to the observation tower and use Cissnei's binoculars again to look for anything out of the ordinary.
Head to the spot where you saw suspicious activity and search for fiends.
Return to the observation tower and use Cissnei's binoculars once more to look for anything out of the ordinary.
Head to the spot where you saw suspicious activity and search for fiends.

Cissnei may be a woman with many secrets, but she is willing to admit that she and Cloud have met before. Though the circumstances of that meeting remain unclear, she assures them that she is and will continue to be a friend─provided they don't dig too deep.

I came to Gongaga to find inspiration for my next children's book, but even in this verdant forest I feel the walls closing in all around me! I'm trapped in a mental prison─a maze of my own making─and need a muse to deliver me from the creative doldrums!
Speak with the children's book author to hear the details.
Head to the Rugged Shoals and photograph Red in a manner that captures the "resolve" theme.
Head to the Gongaga reactor and photograph Red in a manner that illustrates the "suffering" theme.
Head to the Gongaga airstrip and photograph Red in a manner that conveys the "odyssey" theme.
Return to Maeve and hand over the pictures she requested for inspiration.

With Red XIII's help, Maeve is inspired to create the tale of the Crimson Warrior, which she hopes will be her next best-selling children's book. But regardless of how popular it becomes, Barret knows it will be a big hit with Marlene.

Wanna put your chocobo-riding skills to the test? Then why not take on a ring course? I had it built custom for my daughter, but since she's not putting it to use these days, I figure anyone with a mind to up their game ought to take advantage. Don't be a stranger!
Speak with the rancher to hear the details.
To take advantage of Kamaria's training facilities, you must first capture the chocobo Aponi.
Ride Aponi to the first of Kamaria's training courses.
Bring your chocobo-riding skills to bear and complete the first training course.
Follow Shani to the second of her mother's training courses.
Put Aponi through her paces and complete the second training course.
Follow Shani to the third of her mother's training courses.
Remind Shani that there's no other chocobo like Aponi by completing the third training course.

Cloud's inexplicable expertise as a chocobo interpreter proves instrumental in helping Shani mend her relationship with Aponi, her chocobo. Once she recovers from her injury, the young jockey promises to get back in the saddle and show everyone her full potential.

Portents of calamitous ruin have been sighted in the vale of late─dreadful fiends whose very presence heralds doom. But all is not yet lost, for in times past we have observed celestial phenomena indicative of the great mother's triumph over such forces. We request assistance with spotting and photographing said phenomena; seek out the mentor Caesar for more information.
Speak with the skywatchers to hear the details.
Head to the locations where fiends were recently observed and take pictures of the heavens which match those contained in the <color=yellow-black>phenomena reports</color>.
Return to Caesar and hand over the pictures you took of celestial phenomena.

Caesar and the other skywatchers are comforted by the photos taken by Cloud and Aerith. Afterwards, Cloud recalls the sight of Aerith praying for the party's safety...and the strange sense of unease that filled his heart in that moment.
It's been entirely too long since I've done some old-fashioned fieldwork, and I'd like to correct that. Unfortunately, I seem to have misplaced my tools. Drop by and lend a hand, won't you?
Speak with Bugenhagen to hear the details.
Head to the first lifespring and take new measurements to compare with those in the previous field report.
Head to the second and third lifesprings and take new measurements to compare with those in the previous field report.
Head to the fourth lifespring and take new measurements to compare with those in the previous field report.
Head to the final lifespring and take new measurements to compare with those in the previous field report.

Bugenhagen successfully completes his survey of the lifesprings. The results are troubling, to say the least, but he urges Cloud and Red XIII not to be discouraged, for even a single well-meaning individual has the potential to make a world-changing difference.
Hey Nanaki, the survey team came back early─said there's Gi down in the canyon basin. Come see me as soon as you read this!
Speak with the guard to hear the details.
Take the elevator down into the canyon basin and look for the Gi specters reported by the survey team.
Follow the Gi specters and attempt to reason with them.
Continue to follow the Gi specters and attempt to reason with them.
Follow the Gi specters and convince them that Nanaki is not his father, Seto.

The spirits of the Gi who broke free of their fetters have been appeased, though not without some difficulty. Only after Red XIII explains he is Seto's son and takes an oath to bring them peace do they depart. No matter how long it takes, Red intends to keep his word and honor his father's memory.

Was headed to the airstrip when I had a run-in with one hell of a fiend. Led it on a merry chase until my baby's engine gave up the ghost, and now I'm stranded here. I can fix her, but so long as that bastard's still around, I doubt I'll get far regardless. If anyone can come and bail me out, I'd be in your debt.
Speak with the traveler to hear the details.

Purchase a vibrodetector from a moogle emporium.

The vibrodetector will only be available for purchase once their merchant rank has increased to four.
Use the <color=yellow-black>vibrodetector</color> to locate and dispatch the fiend that waylaid Zhijie.

Though the reunion is brief, Yuffie is glad to see Zhijie and help him out of a jam. He resumes his journey to Wutai, and though a part of Yuffie wants to join him, she knows she cannot return home until she has gathered enough materia to aid her countrymen.

Chocobos are lovely creatures, but they can be a handful if you don't know the proper techniques. I offer personal training tailored to your specific needs. Sign up now for a special course at my retreat which includes three meals, afternoon naps, and a luxurious pool open all hours of the day.
Speak with the chocobo sage to hear the details.
To partake of the sage's wisdom, you must first capture the chocobo Selena.
Return to the chocobo sage and inform him that you have captured Selena.
Ride Selena and use her unique talents to gather at least thirty <color=yellow-black>tufts of chocograss</color>, then return to the sage and hand them over.
Undertake the chocobo sage's final trial and beat him in a race to prove yourself a bona fide choco-pro.

It remains a matter of debate how wise the chocobo sage truly is. Nevertheless, Billy appears to have benefitted from his unorthodox training─and from learning more about his father and Sam. Eyes bright with renewed purpose, he sets his sights on the Gold Cup.

The darling little cat I feed from time to time hasn't come around for a while, and it's making me sick with worry. I know they can be independent souls, but she's never been one to turn down a good meal...
Speak with the head chef to hear the details.
Search for a snow-white cat at the foot of Mt. Nibel.
Accompany Fluffy as she searches for her kittens and keep them safe from harm.
Continue to accompany Fluffy as she searches for her kittens and keep them safe from harm.
Escort Fluffy and her kittens back to Nibelheim.
Look for Fluffy inside the house.
Join the other local musicians in putting on a brief performance.

Christine is overjoyed to welcome Fluffy back home. With a song in her heart yearning to be set free, she urges Tifa to join the locals in putting on a show, and for a time, the village is filled with music.
Track Down the Head Chef's Cat

Tell me you've heard it too. The woman in the manor, weeping or wailing or...I don't know. I don't want to know, really─can't bring myself to even go into the manor these days. But someone needs to get to the bottom of this...or I'll never be able to sleep again.
Speak with the supervisor to hear the details.
Return to Shinra Manor and see if there is any truth to the rumors of a wailing woman.
Explore the depths of Shinra Manor and search for evidence of paranormal activity.
Successfully complete all of the Shinra Manor combat simulator challenges to proceed deeper into the facility.
Proceed into the deepest depths of the facility to learn the true identity of the wailing woman.

In the depths of Shinra Manor, Cloud and his comrades discover the source of the mysterious voice: a tortured fiend produced by Hojo's experiments. After laying the creature to rest, the party considers whether or not "monsters" have feelings─a question that a man like Vincent has doubtless pondered for many long years...

Fellow disciples of diversions and delights, to you I issue a challenge! I, once a man of middling achievements, now lauded as a champion of champions, have set new high scores in the most beloved of the Gold Saucer's many attractions. Come, players, and pit your skills against mine, and strive to claim my title of Ultimate Party Animal!
Speak with the Ultimate Party Animal to hear the details.
Accept the Ultimate Party Animal Challenge and beat the Shinra middle manager's high scores at the five chosen attractions.
Face off against the Shinra middle manager-cum-UPA in a 3D Brawler showdown.

A new Ultimate Party Animal has been crowned: Cloud Strife. For the sake of his subordinates, the unexpected embodiment of joy and wonder that is the Shinra middle manager must return to the banality of office life─but for a brief, shining moment, he was free.
Party Hard with the Shinra Middle Manager
Beat the UPA's High Score in Galactic Saviors
Beat the UPA's High Score at the Musclehead Colosseum
Beat the UPA's High Score at the Chocobo Races

The Meridian Ocean
This ocean is so named for the manner in which it divides the eastern and western continents. Shinra vessels travel between Junon and Costa del Sol on a regular basis, ensuring that the flow of private and commercial traffic remains unimpeded.

The Grasslands
The verdant countryside which borders the outskirts of Midgar is littered with modest settlements and homesteads, including Bill's chocobo ranch. Midgardsormr, a giant serpent, has reportedly laid claim to a portion of the wetlands, beyond which can be found the Mythril Mine, from where the once-prized ore was extracted and shipped to every corner of the world.

Junon
Serving as a transport hub for land, sea, and air traffic, as well as a base of operations for local mako development, this fortified city lies at the heart of the western coastline. Shinra's investment has seen it prosper in recent years, and Junon is now second only to Midgar in size. However, within Under Junon and the Crow's Nest, there are still pockets of resistance that resent Shinra and all that they stand for.

Corel
Massive mountains and vast deserts are the defining features of this harsh expanse. While the resort town of Costa del Sol draws a constant stream of travelers to the eastern shore, few are inclined to head further inland. Abandoned coal mines and the ruins of a mako reactor are among the few points of interest in the wastes outside the beachside paradise.

Gongaga
Within these lush jungles relatively untouched by human hands, a small community strives to live a self-sufficient existence. They cultivate several staple crops, including mushrooms, which thrive in the humid climate. Shinra's presence is nevertheless felt, for the partially destroyed mako reactor is a constant reminder of the company's folly.

Cosmo Canyon
It was among the red rocks of this ancient geological formation that planetology was first conceived. While many pilgrims and scholars gather here to deepen their scientific and spiritual knowledge, the vale also attracts tourists that possess only a passing familiarity with the core tenets.

Nibel
The jagged crags of Mt. Nibel and the adjacent peaks dominate the skies above this remote region. At the foot of the mountain lies Nibelheim, a quiet village into which Shinra invested a substantial amount of money. In exchange, the company secured the villagers' cooperation in the construction of the world's very first mako reactor.

The Northwood
The legendary Temple of the Ancients is said to be hidden somewhere in this unexplored wilderness. As few have dared to venture into the dense forests─and even fewer have returned─what little can be said about it is speculation and hearsay.

Moogle Trio Summoning Materia

Summon a group of moogles that turns any battle into a kupo-tivating experience.

Magic Pot Summoning Materia

Summon an eldritch jar full of supportive surprises. Which of them it will bestow, however, is anyone's guess.

Posh Chocobo Summoning Materia

Summon a fledgling chocobo that is as stylish as it is adept at casting elemental spells.

Armor: Midgar Bangle Mk. II (Grade 1)

A bangle worn by a wayfarer who left Midgar behind in order to see the wonders of the world. Has a single materia slot.

Armor: Orchid Bracelet (Grade 2)

A bracelet crafted with such an inspiring design that anyone who wears it─no matter how timid─gains the courage to explore the world at large. Has two linked and one independent materia slots.

Armor: Shinra Bangle Mk. II (Grade 3)

A sophisticated bangle engraved with the Shinra Electric Power Company logo. Has two independent materia slots.

Accessory: Kupo Charm
A talisman from a moogle who traveled the world collecting rare curios. Adds a fixed chance of increasing your haul when gathering materials.

Survival Set
A collection of items featuring potions, bottles of ether, and other consumables that will surely prove useful for those looking to travel the globe.

Accessory: Reclaimant Choker

A choker inspired by the ebb and flow of the lifestream. Restores a small amount of HP upon defeating enemies.

Leviathan Summoning Materia

Allows those with FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE saved data to summon Leviathan.

Ramuh Summoning Materia

Allows those with FF7R EPISODE INTERmission saved data to summon Ramuh.
